"Jair," "Shimei," and "Kish" are men from whom "Mordecai" is the male descendant. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
contextId.quote: son of Jair son of Shimei son of Kish

These are the names of two men. They were spoken of in [[:en:bible:notes:est:02:19|2:21]], but Bigthana's name was spelled "Bigthan" there. You may translate his name as you did there or according to how it is spelled in this verse. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_names]])
